channel.title: Pianobin
channel.description: Piano tutorials, sheet music, and arrangements.

item.title: Patreon Members Board 09.2022
item.description: Thank you to the following patrons for their support...
item.content:encoded:
Background: In 2017 during my school’s winter holiday I began to create piano arrangements and upload them to a channel under the name Pianobin. This was because there were songs I could not find arrangements for so I wanted to try making them even without much experience. I continued making arrangements and in 2019 I opened a Patreon account for those that wanted to support me beyond watching videos.

Making piano arrangements is a hobby and the videos will always remain free, but I am especially grateful for the following people who have supported my work through Patreon for extended time:
